title: 3 Simple Ways to Save a Web Page as a PDF in Google Chrome

steps.title: Open the web page you want to save in Google Chrome.
steps.content: Open the web page you want to save in Google Chrome. This browser has a built-in Save to PDF option you can use to save web pages. Google Chrome is available to download on Windows, Mac, and Linux. [1] X Research source Make sure Chrome is updated .

steps.title: Click ⋮.
steps.content: Click ⋮ . This is in the top-right corner of the window.

steps.title: Click Print.
steps.content: Click Print . This will open the Print window. Alternatively, you can press CTRL + P (Windows) or CMD + P (Mac) to quickly open this window.

steps.title: Click the "Destination" drop-down menu.
steps.content: Click the "Destination" drop-down menu. If you have any printers connected, you'll see them listed here.

steps.title: Click Save as PDF.
steps.content: Click Save as PDF . You can find this in the drop-down menu. If you're using a Microsoft device, you may also see Microsoft Print to PDF . This option will also create a PDF.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . This is the blue button at the bottom of the window. A pop-up window will open.

steps.title: Select a save location and click Save.
steps.content: Select a save location and click Save . For some devices, the default location may be set to the Downloads folder. The web page will be saved to your computer as a PDF file .

steps.title: Open a webpage in the Google Chrome app.
steps.content: Open a webpage in the Google Chrome app. This browser app allows you to save any webpage as a PDF file.

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . You can find this in the address bar on the right. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Print.
steps.content: Tap Print . This will be below the list of apps.

steps.title: Tap at the top.
steps.content: Tap at the top. You can find this on the right of Options .

steps.title: Tap Save to Files.
steps.content: Tap Save to Files . Alternatively, you can select an app on the list to share via Messages , Mail , or another app.

steps.title: Select a save location and tap Save.
steps.content: Select a save location and tap Save . The PDF will be saved to the Files app. If you selected an app, select the location or recipient and send it.

steps.title: Open a webpage in the Google Chrome app.
steps.content: Open a webpage in the Google Chrome app. This browser app allows you to save any webpage as a PDF file.

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . You can find this in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Select Save as PDF.
steps.content: Select Save as PDF . On some devices, you may need to tap the Share icon first.

steps.title: Select a save location and tap Save.
steps.content: Select a save location and tap Save . The PDF will be saved to your Android. You can usually find PDF files in the Documents folder.
